text.p: True or false: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix

and [mathjaxinline]x[/mathjaxinline] is any vector in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], then the resulting product [mathjaxinline]Ax[/mathjaxinline] must be in [mathjaxinline]\mathrm{Span}\{ v_1; v_2; \ldots v_ n\}[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: The span of a list of vectors is the set of all linear combinations of those vectors. [mathjaxinline]Ax[/mathjaxinline] is defined to be a linear combination of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline], and so it is in the span of those columns.
